description: This file defines a React functional component 'CartItem' for rendering individual items in a shopping cart, including quantity controls and a remove button. It includes type annotations for props, uses hooks for state management, and imports several external modules.

methods.name: CartItem
methods.description: React functional component that displays a cart item along with quantity controls and a remove button.

methods.name: handleIncrease
methods.description: Increases the item quantity, calling onIncrease if provided or updating the cart state.

methods.name: handleDecrease
methods.description: Decreases the item quantity, ensuring it doesn't go below 1, or calls onDecrease if provided.

methods.name: handleRemove
methods.description: Removes the item from the cart, calling onRemove if provided or updating cart state.
